\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 5733}

\subsection*{Legal Fun}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{bsflip}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 12 capsls & oral & Kava & extract\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 150.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

I read up on the subsatance kava on this very website, i am not about to become sucked into mainstream illegal drugs and i was looking for a way to be relaxed and feel and see wonderful things in a legal way. After reading the tesimonials i decided to give kava a try. my first few times the pills didnt do much but slightly relax me. lately i decided to up the dose and see if, like cannabis, it would work after a few goes at the drug. WOW! it is unreal. heres what i experienced\ldots 



[8 180mg caps of 55\% kavalactone and 4 400mg caps of 2.5\% kavalactones]



Pros: 

state of utter realaxation

heavy legs, [urge to rest and let go]

vision sharply focuses then unfocuses

vision blurs as u move or others move quickly,

   when u steady a cool drifty state takes control of u for a few seconds.

lights and colors pop out and seem intriguing

you feel like u are moving when u aren't.

everything seems good

music is elegant and flowing

overall it is a wonderful experience



Cons:

slight nausea

\end{document}
